column3: â€œi love this strain...a great heady high to be enjoyed all day long or all night long..can work high all night on this wonderful strain. .i strongly recommendâ€

â€œA great cross of Blue Dream productive and creative, with the added Spacey body Buzz. great afternoon video game session with friends strain. definitely happy, and not noticing usual aches and pains. similar vibe to Snoops dreamâ€

â€œVery nice flavor, in this cross between Blue Dream and  Northern Lights #5. It's sativa dominant, but yet still fairly heavy enough for nighttime use but does not promote drowsiness for the most part.

Very nice blue/purple type of smell and flavor with a buzz similar to permafrost. A good hybrid for all around use, with to me what seems to be a bit on the heavier side for a sativa which is what I prefer. In other ...â€

â€œEveryone's problems aren't the same. Everyone has problems just the same. Everyone can't seem to realize, that the problem is in fact in front of them.

â€œI'm very relaxed, nice mellow body high.  I especially appreciate how I feel my muscles just sort of melting into relaxation.  This helps a lot with my back pain in that sense (because it's musco-skeletal tension).  

The first time I smoked it and I got a bit anxious.  Just a couple solid puffs.  I generally vaporize my herb.  Vaping it, I don't feel anxious.

I have brutal cotton mouth.â€

â€œMy favorite strain is Blue Dream so I was excited when I got the chance to smoke this! Northern Lights is a good strain too.. â€œWhat a unique and special strain! In some ways, this strain is more Sativa-like than many pure Sativa's because the high is so cerebral, creative, happy, sociable, talkative; and, because the corresponding body high is so minimal: No discernable sleepiness, heaviness, or inertia. I can be productive and focused if I need to be, or playful and creative (which is what I generally roll with).   This magical herb I smoke...â€
â€œStrong red eyes for me to, nice taste and head high.â€

â€œGreat strain. Has a relaxed, laid back feel with subtle hints of creative, cerebral sensations. Makes you happy. The high isn't very strong when it hits you. You sort of glide into it without really noticing at first. I think this is an okay strain to use before bed. Very relaxing.â€
â€œYesssssâ€
â€œIt hits hard, harsh on my throat. definitely have some burning and lots of coughing. It's not a bad strain, but it wears off quicklyâ€

â€œgood hybrid, but maybe not as classic as Snoops dream? Definitely got a few chuckles this time, and some energy. However, didn't get as much pain relief as last time. solid 4.5 strain. Not sure I'd be looking to pay a premium price for it. unless somehow I'm saving sea creatures by smoking it.â€
â€œHappy giggly fun! Talkative and uplifting. This is my current favorite. No negative effects that I can think of. Maybe a bit of dry eye but that was solved with the tears from laughter.â€
â€œNice n mellow hit. Relaxing. Quick head rush at beginning. Nice body buzz. Felt nice while in hot tub. Feel it heavy in my eyes.â€

â€œi purchased this looking for an easy-smoking sleep aid/pain relief. it provided both of these things without an overly intense body high, which i also appreciated. while i did wake the next morning with a headache, it is too early in my use of this strain to draw a definite link.â€

â€œThe high was decent, the percentage is right around 26 percent. For me, this strain is a creeper. It took nearly 20 minutes after I finished a joint of this to feel it. It is definitely a strain that I would smoke again if it was given to meâ€
â€œI will definitely buy this one again! I loved it.â€
â€œThis weed is awesome so dense and awesome taste. Sent my head to the moon and it lasted a long time.â€

â€œNot a super big fan of this one. Like others said it gave me a killer headache and terrible red eyes. The initial 15-20 minutes gave me terrible anxiety to the point of having panic attacks. â€œGrown by Happy Hill- sooooo good. Probably my new favorite. Makes everything that feels good feel even better. Feels incredibly clear minded. A++++ strain for me.â€
